p: The procedure of Saki et al. ( 2019) was used to determine the total flavonoid content of the CEO. Briefly, the absorbance of the mixture of CEO, NaNO 2, AlCl 3, NaOH, and distilled water was recorded at 510 nm, and the content of total flavonoids of the CEO was then expressed as mg quercetin equivalent (QE)/g.
